recipesJson.name: Chocolate Almond milkshake
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: this is my version of a chocolate milkshake with alil touch of almond added into which makes nice and rich & at the same time got a little thickness to it which I enjoy so guys mix this up and 70vg 30pg and tell me whatcha think guys and keep mixing & venge on
